  "Initiated By" : "NATION FUTURES ASSOCIATION",
  "Allegations" : "ON MARCH 14, 2012, A SUBCOMMITTEE OF NFA'S MEMBERSHIP COMMITTEE ISSUED A FINAL ORDER GRANTING CONDITIONAL REGISTRATION TO KNIGHT. ON THE BASIS OF THE CONSENT EVIDENCED BY KNIGHT'S SETTLEMENT OFFER, AND WITHOUT ANY ADJUDICATION ON THE MERITS, THE SUBCOMMITTEE FOUND THAT KNIGHT IS DISQUALIFIED FROM REGISTRATION UNDER SECTION 8A(3)(E)(III) OF THE ACT. ACCORDINGLY, THE SUBCOMMITTEE ORDERS THAT KNIGHT'S AP REGISTRATION BE HEREBY GRANTED SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS. THE CONDITIONS BECOME EFFECTIVE ON APRIL 13, 2012. AT THE CONCLUSION OF A ONE-YEAR PERIOD FROM THE EFFECTIVE DATE OF THE FINAL ORDER, KNIGHT MAY REQUEST THAT NFA'S MEMBERSHIP COMMITTEE LIFT THE CONDITIONS ON HIS AP REGISTRATION. THESE CONDITIONS REMAIN IN EFFECT UNTIL LIFTED BY NFA'S MEMBERSHIP COMMITTEE. TO VIEW THE FINAL ORDER, GO TO CASE DOCUMENTS. TO OBTAIN A COPY, CONTACT NFA'S INFORMATION CENTER.",
